definitions.usage_example: I need to figure out how this new software works.
definitions.alternative_example: I need to understand how this new software works.
definitions.usage_example_es: Necesito entender (descifrar) cómo funciona este nuevo software.

definitions.usage_example: Can you figure out the total cost for me?
definitions.alternative_example: Can you calculate the total cost for me?
definitions.usage_example_es: ¿Puedes calcular el costo total por mí?

definitions.usage_example: I can't figure him out. He's very quiet.
definitions.alternative_example: I can't understand him. He's very quiet.
definitions.usage_example_es: No puedo entenderlo (descifrarlo). Es muy callado.
